content:
Yes you can change or edit just one single instance of a recurring event.

Double-click on the specific event you want to change.

A dialog box should appear.

This event: This changes only the instance you double-clicked. The rest of the series remains unchanged.

All events: This changes the entire series from the beginning.

Make your changes time, location, title, etc. and save.

Create a recurring event

content:
Staré indexové soubory .msf se často poškodí při přesunu mezi počítači. Zkuste znovu vytvořit indexy složek

Postup: Zavřete Thunderbird. Najděte složku s profilem (např. C:\Users\<uživatel>\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\<náhodný>.default-release\Mail\ nebo ImapMail\). V těchto složkách smažte všechny soubory s koncovkou .msf (ne složky bez koncovky!). Spusťte Thunderbird – indexy se znovu vytvoří. Tímto krokem se nevymažou e-maily, jen se přegenerují indexy.
creator: Ansamb

content:
Ztrácení štítků a přečtení stavu často souvisí s neúplnou synchronizací IMAP složek (štítky se ukládají lokálně, ale po přepočítání stavu se přepíšou daty ze serveru). Je pravdepodobne poškozena databáze global-messages-db.sqlite

Zkuste: Zavřít Thunderbird. Ve složce profilu najít a smazat soubor global-messages-db.sqlite Po restartu Thunderbird vytvoří nový index. (První spuštění může být pomalejší, dokud se přepočítá.)
creator: Ansamb

content: You are asking for a solution that does not download messages to local storage, but also downloads for full indexing. The act of downloading all messages will, in itself, require resources. For a thin execution, the default is to just download headers until a specific message is selected. The headers are available for indexing, but only from header content. Indexing body content requires that the message be downloaded. That's how IMAP works. This URL may be useful: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/imap-synchronization
creator: davidsk

content:
Ok ok. Let the TB to download message temporarily (for indexing purposes) then delete it (from local tmp) after process is complete.

The "thin" instance of TB should work similarly to a web browser – it downloads information (text/graphics) to a cache for presentation purposes (website/web application), but this cache can be deleted. In the meantime, a history of your browsing activity is created, even though the cache has already been deleted.

In other words - one-time full synchronization with "feeding" the search in TB + successive "feeding" the search with new emails, without storing a local copy permanently (it is stored only, for example, until the program is closed when the user has read a given email)

content: What you are experiencing is that you have two accounts sharing the same SMTP server. You can easily fix this by changing the documentation so it is more visible. - Click to 'account settings. - scroll down left side to 'Outgoing Servers' - on that page you will see all of your SMTP servers - To help fix your problem, edit each one's DESCRIPTION field to have the appropriate email account. This is just for documentation. - NOW, click the account name in the 'account settings' pane and look at bottom row of right side of screen where it links to outgoing SMTPserver. If you see the email address of the other account, you have that account pointing to the wrong server. Click the dropdown menu and select the appropriate server.
creator: davidsk

content:
1. Najčastejšia príčina – zastarané zabezpečenie TLS

Od roku 2022–2024 väčšina e-mailových serverov (Gmail, Outlook, Centrum, Zoznam, atď.) vyžaduje protokol TLS 1.2 alebo TLS 1.3, ale Windows 7 ho pôvodne nepodporuje alebo má ho vypnutý.

Skontrolujte, či máte TLS 1.2 zapnuté: Stlač Windows + R → napíšte inetcpl.cpl → Enter Prejdite na kartu Rozšírené (Advanced) Posuňte sa dole do sekcie Security (Zabezpečenie) Uistite sa, že je zaškrtnuté „Use TLS 1.2“ (Môžete tiež odškrtnúť „SSL 2.0“ a „SSL 3.0“, tie sú zastarané) Kliknite OK a reštartujte Thunderbird.

Ak TLS 1.2 v zozname nie je, nainštalujte aktualizáciu Windows 7 update KB3140245. Stiahnete ju z oficiálneho katalógu Microsoftu: https://www.catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB3140245 Po nainštalovaní a reštarte sa pridá podpora TLS 1.2.

2. Skontrolujte nastavenie účtu v Thunderbirde:

V menu Nástroje → Nastavenia účtu → Nastavenia servera: Server prichádzajúcej pošty (IMAP/POP3) musí byť správny (napr. imap.gmail.com, pop3.azet.sk atď.)

Port a Zabezpečenie pripojenia: napr. IMAP: port 993, TLS/SSL POP3: port 995, TLS/SSL Metóda overovania: „Normálne heslo“ (alebo OAuth2, ak podporuje poskytovateľ)

Podobne v časti Server odchádzajúcej pošty (SMTP): port obvykle 465 (TLS/SSL) alebo 587 (STARTTLS)

content:
You need to give more information as there is no Thunderbird Account.

Perhaps you meant Mozilla Account (formerly called Firefox Account until Nov 1, 2023) which is used for a number of Mozilla services including this support.mozilla.org site and the Thunderbird email client does not make use of the Mozilla Account system. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/access-mozilla-services-firefox-account#w_what-services-can-i-use-with-a-mozilla-account

If you have not logged into a Mozilla Account for two or more years you may get notified of account being deleted at a set date unless you login before then. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/mozilla-account-deletion-inactivity
